channel.title: Thrashie - Sam the wannabe samurai
channel.description:
As you have probably noticed already there has been a drastic change of sound, and wether it’s for better or worse I’ll let you decide. xP Also I owe the auxy, Phuture collective, and sweet tunes communities a huge thanks for supporting me, it means a ton
Phuture collective: https://m.soundcloud.com/phuturecollective
Sweet tunes: https://m.soundcloud.com/sweettunesmusic
Auxy (I know this is pointless) : https://m.soundcloud.com/auxy
Anyways here’s a new release. Hope you guys enjoy! ^-^
https://soundcloud.com/rainbrothrash/sam-the-wanna-be-samurai
![image|500x500](upload://3BpYPpKlXnMzFBjrL0jpdJep7jy.jpeg)

item.title: Thrashie - Sam the wannabe samurai
item.dc:creator: Thrashie
item.description:
Kind of a simple gritty nonstylized art if you will which I feel fits the sound style rather well (imo)

Read full topic

item.title: Thrashie - Sam the wannabe samurai
item.dc:creator: Thrashie
item.description:
Haha it’s all good my dude, the art was inspired by a lot of animals in the room’s early art

(https://m.soundcloud.com/animalsintheroom )

Read full topic

item.title: Thrashie - Sam the wannabe samurai
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Heck yeah, diggin it. Still hear you in there so it’s all good, nothing wrong with having a play at different styles ( and still managing to maintain your sound )

Dat art tho. I’m not loving it, I’m sorry. PALES in comparison to something like this:

(which is still one of my favorite covers/arts I’ve seen around here).

If I didn’t know your work I woulda seen that art and steered clear. Just being honest.

Read full topic
